department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Tassels at bottom; warp faced, red & blue bands interspersed by complementary warp patterning; rabita (edge finish) in red, blue white diamond pattern; strap is plain weave warp faced band in red, blue, green, yellow and white
dimension: 7 3/4 x 8 1/4 in. (19.7 x 21 cm) (tassels not included)
title: Small bag
